text: Tharavadu is a 1994 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Krishnan Munnadu, starring Siddique and Suchithra in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Siddique as Kabirdas * Suchithra Murali as Ranjini * Jagathy Sreekumar as P. Chandrasekhara Menon * Rajan P. Dev as Vasudevan Adhikari * Vijayakumar as Ramesh * Aranmula Ponnamma Ranjini's grandmother * Beena Antony as Zareena * K.B. Ganesh Kumar as Jayadevan * Kanakalatha as Srilakshmi * Kuthiravattam Pappu as Vareethu * MG Soman as Shankunni Menon * Paravoor Bharathan as Kasim Haji * Priyanka * Rizabawa as Sahadevan * Santhadevi as Zareena's mother * Thodupuzha Vasanthy as Ramesh's mother ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Tharavadu (film)
